Also, would anyone be interested in the original Danish version of 'The Killing'? Called Forbrydelsen. I have all 20 episodes of Season One (not my encodes) and can post it to FileServe. They're x264 encoded, 700 kbit video, 96 kbit AAC, 640x360 res, 25 fps. All are about 310-330 MiB.

Not trying to offend anyone or step on toes here...please say so if I am and I'll forget I ever had the idea.

"     720p = for 16:9 aspect ratio (TV and movies) frame-size is 640p or 1120x640
             (because of my own limit of 1400 MB per encode)  
             or 1216x528-544 pixels for 2.35:1 (movies/theatrical AR),
             hardware intensive
             NOT Handhelds/iPod/QuickTime/PSP/Zune/clones compatible file.

             90% of encodes follow that wrong "standard" for years,
             what leads to unimaginable volume of "squashed" objects and people.
